caption: A vibrant Afrobeat track with polyrhythmic percussion, horn section, and call-and-response vocals. Features infectious guitar licks, driving bass, and an irresistible groove rooted in West African musical traditions.
lyrics:
[Intro]

[Verse 1]
The rhythm is calling from across the sea
Ancient beats setting spirits free
Move your body let it sway
This is how we start the day

[Chorus]
Dance to the Afrobeat
Feel it in your feet
Let the rhythm take you higher
Fueled by ancestral fire

[Verse 2]
From Lagos to the world we bring
This joyful sound that makes us sing
Unity in every drum
Together we become one

[Chorus]
Dance to the Afrobeat
Feel it in your feet
Let the rhythm take you higher
Fueled by ancestral fire

[Bridge]

Everybody move!

[Outro]
Afrobeat forever
Afrobeat together
